text:
<@U6KQ2S410> Enjoyed your talk and agree on 1) gap to target 2) not starting with scaling 3) the value of shared recognition of the approach and rough shape of it 4) "substrate" as a name 5) nodes & wires not addressing the problem 6) recognition of spreadsheets, and particularly hypercard

Please count me in on any discussions. FWIW, I feel the big pattern here is *reuse of everything that's not a "business object"*, more than being data-centric, but maybe we're saying the same thing.
